feed.title: Stirling PDF Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.42.0 Windows Install fix, Document conversion changes
entry.content:
• Fix for windows stuck at 90% issue
  • Many bug fixes such as PDF Compression
  • Our backend documentation conversion service unoconv changed to unoserver (please report if you see any conversion issues!)
  • Lots of dependency and security updates!
  • New docker alpine version

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • fix(pdf): resolve compression error and file overwrite issues by @Abdurrahman-shaikh in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2937
  • fix: Allow Entry overflow when text is too long by @ralmn in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2940
  • Fix/full invert crash 2942 by @Abdurrahman-shaikh in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2957

Enhancements

  • Enable Java Formatting - Use build code formatting in VS Code IDE by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2978
  • [PR] Desktop fix and unoconv to unoserver by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2971

Minor Enhancements

  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2985

Docker Updates

  • Bump docker/setup-qemu-action from 3.3.0 to 3.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2902
  • Bump docker/setup-buildx-action from 3.8.0 to 3.9.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2922
  • Bump alpine from 3.21.2 to 3.21.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2961
  • Bump sigstore/cosign-installer from 3.7.0 to 3.8.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2901
  • Bump step-security/harden-runner from 2.10.4 to 2.11.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2980

Translation Changes

  • new strings translated to sv_SE by @swanemar in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2919
  • changes in the translation qpdf to libreoffice by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2909
  • Translate some message to french by @miniupnp in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2912
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2911
  • fix: added missing language string en_GB, sl_SI by @carliblaz in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2908
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2920
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2923
  • Update messages_zh_CN.properties by @songge8 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2948
  • localization by @songge8 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2950
  • Unify translations for "r√©diger" and "caviarder" with "censurer" by @bendem in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2972
  • Translation localization by @Null-wn in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2969
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2982
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2987
  • name change for view PDF to view/edit PDF by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2988

Other Changes

  • GHA/sonarqube: fix authentication by @pheiduck in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2915
  • Bump actions/upload-artifact from 4.3.1 to 4.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2879
  • Bump github/codeql-action from 3.28.8 to 3.28.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2921
  • third-party GitHubAction not pinned by hash by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2925
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2949
  • Fix: Replace pull_request with pull_request_target in SonarQube Workflow for Fork Analysis by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2977

New Contributors

  • @ralmn made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2940
  • @songge8 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2948
  • @bendem made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2972
  • @Null-wn made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2969

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.41.0...v0.42.0

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.43.0 Code cleanups and general changes
entry.content:
Lots of backend changes to our SSO and configs, let us know if you have any issues! Some further changes to note: - Fixed bug were analytics prompt was not being shown on first-ever launch - Compression now supports changing images to grayscale should that be required - Dynamic paths for unoconvert and weasyprint are now supported in settings.yml - For Local UI users we now check if port 8080 is in use and try 8081 etc if it is - Language bar has new UI

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • fix: ignore qpdf warnings (#2952) by @Abdurrahman-shaikh in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3002
  • Fix: Ensure window.analyticsPromptBoolean is Defined for Analytics Dialog by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2958

Enhancements

  • Enhance Java Development Configuration and Code Formatting by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2991
  • 2299 feature request language selection overhaul by @ConnorYoh in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3017
  • Adding font-liberation and font-linux-libertine to fat image (#3001) by @gravasio in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3005
  • Feature/convert to grayscale by @Abdurrahman-shaikh in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3003
  • Dynamic paths for tools and removal of unused book endpoints by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3018
  • Enhance AppUpdateService: Add @Configuration Annotation for Improved Spring Boot Integration by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3036
  • Improve Type-Safe Casting with Pattern Matching by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2990

Minor Enhancements

  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2997
  • Update UserService.java to generate API key if empty by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3016
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3024
  • Remove: pdfjs - only use pdfjs-legacy by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2864
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3028
  • Fix: Analytics Initialization Behavior by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3031
  • Fix showupdate by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3032
  • Login Language Dropdown: Remove Flag Icon by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3037
  • dynamic port for UI from 8080 up (8081 etc) by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3042
  • SSO Refactoring by @DarioGii in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2818
  • Restrict Backup Import to Initialization Process and Refactor API Key Handling by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3061
  • Refactor Path Handling by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3041
  • add view pdf to nav and remove duplicate home on view by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3052
  • Improved Configuration and YAML Management by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2966
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3062

Docker Updates

  • Bump sigstore/cosign-installer from 3.8.0 to 3.8.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3010
  • Bump docker/build-push-action from 6.13.0 to 6.14.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3012
  • Bump actions/upload-artifact from 4.6.0 to 4.6.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3034

Translation Changes

  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2993
  • Update messages_bg_BG.properties by @nimdassdev in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2996
  • Update zh_TW Traditional Chinese translation by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3020
  • Updated spanish translations by @ovargasp in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3039
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3040
  • move compress.grayscale.label to section #compress by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3048
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3055
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3050
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3063

Other Changes

  • Bump io.micrometer:micrometer-core from 1.14.3 to 1.14.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2927
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2989
  • Bump actions/create-github-app-token from 1.11.2 to 1.11.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2878
  • Bump me.friwi:jcefmaven: from 127.3.1 to 132.3.1 by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3023
  • Bump org.springframework.boot from 3.4.1 to 3.4.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3022
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3025
  • Bump ch.qos.logback:logback-classic from 1.5.15 to 1.5.16 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3015
  • Bump ch.qos.logback:logback-core from 1.5.15 to 1.5.16 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3011
  • Bump actions/create-github-app-token from 1.11.3 to 1.11.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3008
  • Bump org.springframework.session:spring-session-core from 3.4.1 to 3.4.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3014
  • Bump org.springframework.security:spring-security-saml2-service-provider from 6.4.2 to 6.4.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3009
  • Bump springBootVersion from 3.4.2 to 3.4.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3007
  • Bump ossf/scorecard-action from 2.4.0 to 2.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3033
  • Bump github/codeql-action from 3.28.9 to 3.28.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3035
  • Bump peter-evans/create-pull-request from 7.0.6 to 7.0.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3051

New Contributors

  • @ConnorYoh made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3017
  • @gravasio made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3005
  • @ovargasp made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3039

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.42.0...v0.43.0

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.43.2 Compression fixes and more
entry.content:
• HTML to PDF now supports webforms to pdf forms
  • Survey prompt now includes the option to book a meeting with us!
  • Search function improved for wider searches
  • PDF compression fixes

If you‚Äôre using Stirling PDF at work, we‚Äôd love to speak to you. we‚Äôre offering free technical support session in exchange for a 15 minute user discovery session. This is a chance to: üõ†Ô∏è Get help with deployment, integrations, or troubleshooting üì¢ Provide direct feedback on performance, edge cases, and feature gaps üîç Help us refine Stirling PDF for real-world enterprise use If you‚Äôre interested, you can book time with our team directly. Looking forward to digging into your use cases and making Stirling PDF even better! https://calendly.com/d/cm4p-zz5-yy8/stirling-pdf-15-minute-group-discussion

What's Changed

Enhancements

  • Improve Case-Insensitive Key Comparison and Path Normalization in Language Properties Check Script by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3067
  • Weasyprint forms #3077 by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3084

Minor Enhancements

  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3070
  • Remove convertBookTypeToPdf and Improve File Sanitization in FileToPdf by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3072
  • Update survey version cache by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3071
  • Add description to search. Fix homepage broken by ) by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3079
  • Remove book site and translation entries by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3078
  • Compression fixes by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3081
  • Survey to allow booking meetings1 by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3095

Docker Updates

  • Bump docker/metadata-action from 5.6.1 to 5.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3094
  • Bump docker/setup-buildx-action from 3.9.0 to 3.10.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3093
  • Bump docker/setup-qemu-action from 3.4.0 to 3.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3092
  • Bump docker/build-push-action from 6.14.0 to 6.15.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3091

Translation Changes

  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3080
  • lang: update fr_FR by @NicolasFR in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3074
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3086

Other Changes

  • Bump ch.qos.logback:logback-core from 1.5.16 to 1.5.17 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3068
  • Bump ch.qos.logback:logback-classic from 1.5.16 to 1.5.17 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3069
  • Bump actions/download-artifact from 4.1.8 to 4.1.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3090
  • chore: migrate vscode settings to editorconfig when possible by @M0NsTeRRR in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3088
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3085

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.43.1...v0.43.2

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.44.0 Memory usage enhancements, highlighter and more!
entry.content:
With this update we bring another possible fix to the 90% load issue for windows users along with multiple big fixes for various tools Huge memory usage improvements for reading large sized PDFs (50MB+) and various other tools!

We also ask users to please migrate their docker URL to our proxy URL to avoid issuers during any package migrations Please change stirlingtools/stirling-pdf (or frooodle/stirling-pdf) to docker.stirlingpdf.com/stirlingtools/stirling-pdf An example for a docker compose could be image: docker.stirlingpdf.com/stirlingtools/stirling-pdf:latest-fat

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • fix desktop client stuck at 90% by @johnmalek312 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3111
  • Fix error banner not getting removed on correct upload by @Karlkorv in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3114
  • Fix auto resizing images in view-pdf by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3121

Enhancements

  • 2926 bug undo feature of multitool delete your upload file by @ConnorYoh in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3101
  • Memory enhancements and PDF decompress API by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3129
  • Add highlighter tool to View-pdf by @ryantang247 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3113

Minor Enhancements

  • ü§ñ format everything with pre-commit by by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3103

Docker Updates

  • Devcontainer by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3097
  • Fix: Devcontainer permission by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3102
  • Update download-security-jar.sh downloadURL by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3126

Translation Changes

  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3099
  • translated newly added strings re business & user interaction by @swanemar in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3116
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3124
  • Update messages_ja_JP.properties by @tkymmm in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3127

Other Changes

  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3100
  • Bump actions/create-github-app-token from 1.11.5 to 1.11.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3109
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3135

New Contributors

  • @johnmalek312 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3111
  • @ryantang247 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3113
  • @Karlkorv made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/3114

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.43.2...v0.44.0
